app.name: Mskn Cloud
app.description: Test environment for managing properties, owners, tenants, and contracts before the backend is ready.
app.error: Could not load mock data. Please try again.

messages.successRegister: Account created successfully. Please sign in.
messages.newDataNotice: This is mock data and is not linked to a real account.
messages.emptyState: No data yet — start by adding the first record.
messages.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

register.title: Create an account
register.subtitle: Enter your basic information to explore the mock system.

login.title: Log in
login.subtitle: Use the mock email and password to continue.

manager.title: Manager dashboard
manager.subtitle: At-a-glance view of the mock portfolio.

owner.title: Owner dashboard
owner.subtitle: Track your assets and active contracts.
owner.propertiesEmptyDescription: Link properties to this owner to surface them here.
owner.contractsEmptyDescription: Create a contract to see its details in this dashboard.

tenant.title: Tenant dashboard
tenant.subtitle: Review your contracts and upcoming payments.
tenant.noUpcomingPayments: No upcoming payments at the moment
tenant.contractsEmptyDescription: Once a contract is signed, it will surface here.
tenant.maintenanceEmptyDescription: Create a new maintenance request to start tracking follow-up.

state.error: Unable to load mock dashboard data.

forms.invalidPhone: Phone number must be between 9 and 12 digits
forms.invalidUrl: Enter a valid URL that starts with http:// or https://

properties.subtitle: Manage the property catalog with mock data before integration.

form.description: Only required fields are validated; everything else is optional.
form.name: Property name
form.imageHint: Use a secure link (https://) to an image hosted on a trusted CDN.

table.title: Properties
table.descriptionWithCount: A total of {count} properties in the mock store.
table.descriptionEmpty: No properties yet — add the first record above.

confirm.title: Delete property?
confirm.message: Are you sure you want to remove "{name}" from the mock database?

tenants.subtitle: Capture mock tenant information without any real account linkage.

form.description: Validate only the required fields; everything else is optional.
form.name: Full name
form.requiredNote: Only the name and mobile number are required to save the record.

table.title: Tenants
table.descriptionWithCount: {count} tenants saved in the mock store.
table.descriptionEmpty: No tenants yet — add the first record.

confirm.title: Delete tenant?
confirm.message: Do you want to remove "{name}" from the mock database?

owners.subtitle: Manage mock owner profiles and link them to properties.

form.description: Only the name and phone are required; everything else is optional.
form.name: Owner name
form.requiredNote: Email and notes can remain empty.

table.title: Owners
table.descriptionWithCount: {count} owners saved in the mock store.
table.descriptionEmpty: No owners yet — add one using the form.

confirm.title: Delete owner?
confirm.message: Do you want to remove "{name}" from the mock database?

contracts.subtitle: Manage mock lease contracts without backend validation.

form.description: Select the related property and tenant, then set the basic terms.

table.title: Contracts
table.descriptionEmpty: No contracts yet — add the first contract.

confirm.title: Delete contract?
confirm.message: Do you want to remove this contract from the mock database?

maintenance.subtitle: Track maintenance requests within the mock dataset.

form.description: Fill in the essential fields; everything else can remain blank.
form.title: Request title

confirm.title: Delete maintenance request?
confirm.message: Do you want to remove "{title}" from the mock database?

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: System configuration (coming soon).
settings.emptyDescription: This page will host system configuration options once the backend integration is ready.
